body: Unfortunately, nhentai currently only supports Japanese, Chinese and English translations. However, you could commission a translator to translate a doujin here into French, as a lot of translators who upload here are very cheap, and some are even willing to do it for free.

Hi, I'm French.
I love this manga. I noticed that the translations are only Japanese, Chinese or English. Will it be possible to send versions (previously translated by us) in our own language?
We need a spam bot holocaust smh
Niggas always dropping links on this site smh
